mapper.select: SELECT c.cbt_code as "cbtCode", c.open_class as "openClass", c.cbt_title as "cbtTitle", l.class_title as "classTitle", p.name as "name", c.final_date as "finalDate" FROM CBT_LIST c , NEW_CLASS n , CLASS_LIST l, PROFESSOR p WHERE c.open_class = n.open_class AND n.class_code = l.class_code AND n.prof_code = p.prof_code ORDER BY cbt_code

SELECT c.cbt_code as "cbtCode", c.open_class as "openClass", c.cbt_title as "cbtTitle", l.class_title as "classTitle", p.name as "name", c.final_date as "finalDate" FROM CBT_LIST c , NEW_CLASS n , CLASS_LIST l, PROFESSOR p WHERE c.open_class = n.open_class AND n.class_code = l.class_code AND n.prof_code = p.prof_code AND c.open_class in ( SELECT open_class FROM CLASS_STATUS WHERE prof_code = #{code} ) ORDER BY cbt_code
